title: What was your favorite bug that had an actual effect on gameplay?
body: Mine was the recent one where autoing turrets didnt properly take FQC stacks at max stacks giving you 15 gold and haste at every turret hit, came in handy lol.

replies.body: I don't recall what season it was, I'd imagine around 2. The bug with Alistar's knock-up, sending the enemy player into space at Mach 5. xD
I love bugs like that, it can still happen if you chain displacement cc too sometimes lol...  i wonder if maybe bugs like this are the whole reason Poppy's ult exists?

ancient coin bug on secondary resource champs, like vlad and rengar where the mana coin drop would completely fill up their bars and give the empowered ability.  vlad/rengo sup was pretty fun that week
Kha'Zix was my least favorite bug.... hope that bug gets fixed or removed soon.
I love the delayed naut hooks bug whenever it pops up. Being capable of moving in between launching your hook and someone walking on the trapped spot is hysterical.

In season 1 Kog's W was bugged.

Whenever he popped it, it doubled his bonus AD.

Only survived a week, but what a week it was.
